xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: Since the format of Cash Flow Statement in XBRL results utility differs from the signed quick results submitted by the Company with Stock Exchanges on May 17, 2022, the reporting of figures in the Cash Flow Statement has been made in line with the quick financial results. Therefore, following re-classification has been made: 1.Adjustments for provisions, current to be read as Adjustments for provisions, current & non-current 2.Adjustments for other financial liabilities, current to be read as Adjustments for other financial & non-financial liabilities, current & non-current 3.Adjustments for other financial assets, current to be read as Adjustments for other financial & non-financial assets, current & non-current 4.Other adjustments for non-cash items also includes Exceptional items (net)
